name: Parallel (X)
description:
Parallel (X) is a puzzle solving game where you are trapped as a little rat whose tail has been eaten and replaced by a giant earthworm. To find your way out of this mysterious place, sharpen your eyes and use the most important resource at your disposal: The Mirror.

This game is being developed by Parenthesix, and we would like to thanks to all of our friends in the industry. Feel free to test it and don't mind giving us some feedback, it will be extremely appreciated.

Use WASD or ↑↓←→ to walk

Hold SPACE next to a box to move it

(Fullscreen is recommended)
